data.text:
Welcome

St. George’s is an inclusive Episcopal congregation

located in the heart of Haverford Township and part of the

Episcopal Diocese of Pennsylvania.

“Remember the Sabbath day and keep it holy.”

~Exodus 20:8

SUNDAY SERVICES

8:00 AM Rite I

Click here for August 25, 2024 8:00 a.m. bulletin

10:00 AM Rite II

Click here for August 25, 2024 10:00 a.m. bulletin

Click here for Facebook page

*Rite I – Traditional language

**Rite II – Contemporary language

SUNDAYS at 10am

Godly Play Sunday School Program

Stewardship 2024

Visit the Stewardship portal to find online and print pledge forms.

Miscellaneous

Our Parish Profile

We are a community devoted to a rich liturgical tradition where faith in Jesus Christ and friendship are shared through a variety of worship experiences

and service opportunities.

Our Parish Profile

The weekly E-Tale, our parish newsletter: August 21, 2024

Subscribe to the E-tale at this link: http://eepurl.com/ggysIf

Come and See!

We are located on the corner of West Ardmore Avenue and Darby Road in Ardmore, PA.

Click for a map.
